T03D3786:1b-1: aa bhi sa ma ya aa lam k'a ra n'a
T03D3786:1b-2: ma pradzny'a p'a ra mi to ba de sha sh'a
T03D3786:1b-5: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag
T03D3786:1b-6: gi bstan bcos [dd] mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan zhes
T03D3786:1b-7: bya ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa /
T03D3786:1b-8: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T03D3786:1b-9: nyan thos zhi ba tshol rnams kun shes nyid kyis nyer zhir 'khrid mdzad gang yin dang //
T03D3786:1b-10: 'gro la phan par byed rnams lam shes nyid kyis 'jig rten don sgrub mdzad pa gang //
T03D3786:1b-11: gang dang yang dag ldan pas thub rnams rnam pa kun ldan sna tshogs 'di gsungs pa //
T03D3786:1b-12: nyan thos byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bcas sangs rgyas kyi ni yum de la phyag 'tshal //
T03D3786:1b-13: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid lam //
T03D3786:1b-14: ston pas 'di rnams bshad pa gang //
T03D3786:1b-15: gzhan gyis myong ba ma yin te //
T03D3786:1b-16: chos spyod bcu yi bdag nyid kyi //
T03D3786:1b-17: mdo don dran pa la bzhag nas //
T03D3786:1b-18: blo dang ldan pas mthong 'gyur phyir //
T03D3786:2a-0: bde blag tu ni rtogs pa @2a * //
T03D3786:2a-2: / bya ba rtsam pa'i dgos pa yin //
T03D3786:2a-3: shes rab pha rol phyin pa ni //
T03D3786:2a-4: dngos po brgyad kyis yang dag bshad //
T03D3786:2a-5: rnam kun mkhyen nyid lam shes nyid //
T03D3786:2a-6: de nas thams cad shes pa nyid //
T03D3786:2a-7: rnam kun mngon rdzogs rtogs pa dang //
T03D3786:2a-8: rtse mor phyin dang mthar gyis pa //
T03D3786:2a-9: skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs byang chub //
T03D3786:2a-10: chos kyi sku dang de rnam brgyad //
T03D3786:2a-11: sems bskyed pa dang gdams ngag dang //
T03D3786:2a-12: nges 'byed yan lag rnam bzhi dang //
T03D3786:2a-13: sgrub pa yi ni rten gyur pa //
T03D3786:2a-14: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang //
T03D3786:2a-15: dmigs pa dag dang ched dang ni //
T03D3786:2a-16: go cha 'jug pa'i bya ba dang //
T03D3786:2a-17: tshogs ni nges par 'byung bcas rnams //
T03D3786:2a-18: thub pa'i rnam kun mkhyen pa nyid //
T03D3786:2a-19: mog mog por byed la sogs dang ;
T03D3786:2a-20: / slob ma bse ru'i lam gang dang //
T03D3786:2a-21: 'di dang gzhan pa'i yon tan gyis //
T03D3786:2a-22: phan yon che ba mthong ba'i lam //
T03D3786:2a-23: byed pa dang ni mos pha dang //
T03D3786:2a-24: bstod dang bkur dang bsngags pa dang //
T03D3786:2a-25: bsngo dang rjes su yi rang ba //
T03D3786:2a-26: yid la byed pa bla med dag / sgrub dang shin tu dag pa zhes //
T03D3786:2a-27: bya ba 'di ni sgom pa'i lam //
T03D3786:2a-28: byang chub sems dpa' mkhas rnams kyi //
T03D3786:2a-29: lam shes nyid ni de 'drar bshad //
T03D3786:2a-30: shes pas srid la mi gnas shing //
T03D3786:2a-31: snying rjes zhi la mi gnas dang //
T03D3786:2b-0: @2b thabs ma yin pas ring ba dang //
T03D3786:2b-1: thabs kyis ring ba ma yin nyid //
T03D3786:2b-2: mi mthun gnyen po'i phyogs dag dang //
T03D3786:2b-3: sbyor dang de yi mnyam nyid dang //
T03D3786:2b-4: nyan thos la sogs mthong ba'i lam //
T03D3786:2b-6: rnam pa sbyor bar bcas rnams dang //
T03D3786:2b-7: yon tan skyon ni mtshan nyid bcas //
T03D3786:2b-8: thar dang nges 'byed cha mthun dang //
T03D3786:2b-9: slob pa phyir mi ldog pa'i tshogs //
T03D3786:2b-10: srid dang zhi ba mnyam nyid dang //
T03D3786:2b-11: zhing dag bla na med pa ni //
T03D3786:2b-12: rnam kun mngon rdzogs pa ste //
T03D3786:2b-13: 'di ni thabs mkhas bcas pa yin //
T03D3786:2b-14: de yi rtags dang rnam 'phel dang//
T03D3786:2b-15: brtan dang sems kun gnas pa dang //
T03D3786:2b-16: mthong zhes bya dang sgom pa zhes //
T03D3786:2b-17: bya ba'i lam ni so so la //
T03D3786:2b-18: rnam par rtog pa rnam bzhi yi //
T03D3786:2b-19: gnyen po rnam pa bzhi dang ni //
T03D3786:2b-20: bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin //
T03D3786:2b-21: log par sgrub dang bcas pa ni //
T03D3786:2b-22: rtse mo'i mngon rtogs mthar gyis pa ;
T03D3786:2b-23: / rnam gsum rnam bcu skad cig ma //
T03D3786:2b-24: gcig gis mngon rdzogs byang chub pa //
T03D3786:2b-25: mtshan nyid kyis ni rnam pa bzhi //
T03D3786:2b-26: ngo bo nyid longs rdzogs bcas pa dang //
T03D3786:2b-27: de bzhin gzhan pa sprul pa ni //
T03D3786:2b-28: chos sku mdzad pa dang bcas pa //
T03D3786:2b-29: rnam pa bzhir ni yang dag brjod //
T03D3786:2b-30: sems bskyed pa ni gzhan don phyir //
T03D3786:2b-31: yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod //
T03D3786:2b-32: de dang de ni ma do bzhin du //
T03D3786:2b-33: bsdus dang rgyas pa'i sgo nas brjod //
T03D3786:2b-34: de yang sa gser zla ba me //
T03D3786:2b-35: gter dang rin chen 'byung gnas mtsho //
T03D3786:2b-36: rdo rje ri sman bshes gnyen dang //
T03D3786:2b-37: yid bzhin nor bu nyi ma glu //
T03D3786:2b-38: rgyal po mdzod dang lam po che //
T03D3786:2b-39: bzhon pa bkod ma'i chu dang ni //
T03D3786:2b-40: sgra brnyan chu bo sprin rnams kyis //
T03D3786:2b-41: rnam pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis so //
T03D3786:2b-42: sgrub dang bden pa rnams dang ni //
T03D3786:2b-43: sangs rgyas la sogs dkon mchog gsum //
T03D3786:2b-44: ma zhen yongs su ming la dang//
T03D3786:2b-45: lam ni yongs su 'dzin pa dang //
T03D3786:2b-46: spyan lnga dang ni mngon shes kyi //
T03D3786:2b-47: yon tan drug dang mthong lam dang //
T03D3786:2b-48: bsgom zhes bya la gdams ngag ni //
T03D3786:2b-49: bcu yi bdag nyid shes par bya //
T03D3786:2b-50: dbang po rtul dang rnon po dang //
T03D3786:2b-51: dad dang mthong thob rigs nas rigs //
T03D3786:3a-4: gzugs kyi chags bcom ldan mthong ba yi //
T03D3786:3a-5: chos la zhi lus mngon sum byed //
T03D3786:3a-6: bse ru dang ni nyi shu'o //
T03D3786:3a-7: dmigs pa dang ni rnam pa dang //
T03D3786:3a-8: skyu dang yongs su 'dzin pa yis //
T03D3786:3a-9: byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa yi //
T03D3786:3a-10: drod sogs bdag nyid ji bzhin du //
T03D3786:3a-11: rnam rtog bzhi po ldan brten pa //
T03D3786:3a-12: chung dang 'bring dang chen po rnams //
T03D3786:3a-13: nyan thos bse ru lta bu dang //
T03D3786:3a-14: bcas pa dag las khyad par 'phags //
T03D3786:3a-15: dmigs pa mi rtag la sogs pa //
T03D3786:3a-16: bden pa'i rten can de yi ni //
T03D3786:3a-17: rnam pa mngon zhen la sogs 'gog / theg pa gsum char 'thob pa'i rgyu //
T03D3786:3a-19: gnas dang brtags dang brjod du med //
T03D3786:3a-20: gzugs sogs mi gnas de dag ni //
T03D3786:3a-21: de yi ngo bo rang bzhin med //
T03D3786:3a-22: de dag gcig gi rang bzhin gcig / de mi rtag sogs par mi gnas //
T03D3786:3a-23: de rnams de yi ngo bos stong //
T03D3786:3a-24: de dag gcig gi rang bzhin gcig / chos rnams mi 'dzin gang yin dang //
T03D3786:3a-25: de dag mtshan mar mthong phyir //
T03D3786:3a-26: shes rab kyis ni yongs rtogs pa //
T03D3786:3a-27: thams cad dmigs su med par ro //
T03D3786:3a-28: gzugs sogs ngo bo nyid med nyid //
T03D3786:3a-29: de med pa nyid ngo bo nyid //
T03D3786:3a-30: de dag skye med nges 'byung med //
T03D3786:3a-31: dag dang de dag mtshan ma med //
T03D3786:3a-32: de yi mtshan mar mi brten pas //
T03D3786:3a-33: mos min 'du shes med pa yin //
T03D3786:3a-34: ting 'dzin de yi byed pa nyid //
T03D3786:3a-35: lung ston pa dang rlom pa zad //
T03D3786:3a-36: gsum po phan tshun ngo bo gcig / ting 'dzin rnam par mi rtog pa //
T03D3786:3a-37: de ltar nges 'byed cha mthun ni //
T03D3786:3a-38: chung dang 'bring dang chen po yin //
T03D3786:3a-39: gzhig de yi gnyer po yis //
T03D3786:3a-40: gzugs bar rtog pa rnam pa gnyis //
T03D3786:3a-41: rmongs dang phung sogs bye brag gis //
T03D3786:3a-42: de ni so sor rnam pa dgu //
T03D3786:3a-43: rdzas dang brtags pa'i rten can gyis //
T03D3786:3a-45: rang dbang bdag sogs ngo bo dang //
T03D3786:3a-46: phung sogs rten las de bzhin no //
T03D3786:3a-47: sems mi 'gong ba nyid la sogs //
T03D3786:3a-48: ngo bo nyid med sogs ston byed //
T03D3786:3b-0: de yi mi mthun @3b phyogs bor ba //
T03D3786:3b-1: rnam pa kun tu yongs 'dzin yin //
T03D3786:3b-2: rtogs pa yin ni chos drug dang //
T03D3786:3b-3: gnyen po dang ni spong ba dang //
T03D3786:3b-4: de dag yongs su gtugs pa dang //
T03D3786:3b-5: shes rab snying brtser bcas pa dang //
T03D3786:3b-6: slob ma mthun mong min nyid dang //
T03D3786:3b-7: gzhan gyi don gyi go rims dang //
T03D3786:3b-8: ye shes rtsol ba mi ma'ang bar //
T03D3786:3b-9: 'jug pa'i rten la rigs shes bya //
T03D3786:3b-10: chos kyi dbyings la dbyer med phyir //
T03D3786:3b-11: rigs ni tha dad rung ma yin //
T03D3786:3b-12: rten pa'i chos kyi bye brag gis //
T03D3786:3b-13: de yi dbye ba yongs su brjod //
T03D3786:3b-14: dmigs pa chos rnams thams cad de //
T03D3786:3b-15: de yang dge la sogs pa yin //
T03D3786:3b-16: 'jig rten pa yi rtogs pa dang //
T03D3786:3b-18: zag bcas zag pa med chos dang //
T03D3786:3b-20: slob mthun mong chos rnams dang //
T03D3786:3b-21: gang dag thub pa'i thun mong min //
T03D3786:3b-22: sems can kun mchog nyid sems dang //
T03D3786:3b-23: spangs dang rtogs dang gsum po la //
T03D3786:3b-24: chen po gsum gyi rang byung gi / ched du bya ba 'di shes bya //
T03D3786:3b-25: de dag so sor sbyin la sogs //
T03D3786:3b-26: rnam pa drug tu bsdus pa yis //
T03D3786:3b-27: go cha'i sgrub pa gang yin de //
T03D3786:3b-28: drug tshan drug gis ji bzhin bshad //
T03D3786:3b-29: bsam gtan gzugs med spyin sogs dang //
T03D3786:3b-30: lam dang byams la sogs pa dang //
T03D3786:3b-31: dmigs pa med dang ldan pa dang //
T03D3786:3b-32: 'khor gsum rnam par dag pa dang //
T03D3786:3b-33: ched du bya dang mngon shes drug / rnam kun mkhyen pa'i tshul la ni //
T03D3786:3b-34: 'jug pa'i sgrub pa theg chen la //
T03D3786:3b-35: 'dzegs pa yin par shes par bya //
T03D3786:3b-36: brtse dang spyin la sogs pa drug / zhi gnas lha ga mthong bcas pa dang //
T03D3786:3b-37: zung du 'brel ba'i lam gang dang //
T03D3786:3b-38: thabs la mkhas pa gang yin dang //
T03D3786:3b-39: ye shes dang ni bsod nams dang //
T03D3786:3b-40: lam dang gzungs dang sa bcu dang //
T03D3786:3b-41: gnyen pa tshogs kyi sgrub pa yi //
T03D3786:3b-42: rim pa yin par shes par bya //
T03D3786:3b-43: yongs su spyong ba rnam bcu yis //
T03D3786:3b-45: bsam dang phan pa'i dngos nyid dang //
T03D3786:3b-46: sems can rnams la sems mnyam nyid //
T03D3786:4a-2: dam chos dmigs pa tshol ba dang //
T03D3786:4a-3: rtag tu nges 'byung sems nyid dang //
T03D3786:4a-4: sangs rgyas skur 'dod dga' ba dang //
T03D3786:4a-5: chos ston pa dang bden pa yi //
T03D3786:4a-6: tshig ni bcu pa yin par 'dod //
T03D3786:4a-7: 'di dag rang bzhin mi dmigs pas //
T03D3786:4a-8: yongs su sbyong bar shes par bya //
T03D3786:4a-9: tshul khrims byas pa gzo dang bzod //
T03D3786:4a-10: rab tu dga' dang snying brtse che //
T03D3786:4a-11: bkur sti bla ma la gus nyan //
T03D3786:4a-12: brgyad pa spyin la sogs la brtson //
T03D3786:4a-13: thos pa mi ngoms nyid dang ni //
T03D3786:4a-14: zang zing med par chos sbyin dang //
T03D3786:4a-15: sangs rgyas zhing kun sbyong ba dang //
T03D3786:4a-16: 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo dang //
T03D3786:4a-17: ngo tsha khrel yod ces bya ba //
T03D3786:4a-18: rlom med bdag nyid de rnam lnga //
T03D3786:4a-19: ngas gnas 'dod chung chog shes dang //
T03D3786:4a-20: sbyangs pa yang dag sdom bsten dang //
T03D3786:4a-21: bslab pa yongs su mi gtong dang //
T03D3786:4a-22: 'dod pa rnams la smod pa dang //
T03D3786:4a-23: mya ngan 'das dang bdog kun gtong //
T03D3786:4a-24: mi zhum pa dang lta ba med //
T03D3786:4a-27: bdag bstod gzhan la brnyas pa dang //
T03D3786:4a-28: mi dge'i las kyi lam bcu dang //
T03D3786:4a-29: rlom pas khengs dang phyin ci log / blo ngan dang ni nyon mongs bzod //
T03D3786:4a-30: bcu po 'di ni rnam spangs na //
T03D3786:4a-31: sa lnga pa ni yang dag 'thob //
T03D3786:4a-32: sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus //
T03D3786:4a-33: bsam gtan shes rab rab rdzogs pas //
T03D3786:4a-34: slob ma dang ni bas ru la //
T03D3786:4a-35: dga' dang skrag pa'i sems spangs pa //
T03D3786:4a-36: bslangs na mi zhum bdog pa kun //
T03D3786:4a-37: btang yang mi dga' med pa dang //
T03D3786:4a-38: dbul yang slong ba mi spod bas //
T03D3786:4a-39: sa ni drug pa yang dag 'thob //
T03D3786:4a-40: bdag dang sems can 'dzin pa dang //
T03D3786:4a-41: srog dang gang zag chad rtag dang //
T03D3786:4a-42: mtshan ma rgyu dang phung po dang //
T03D3786:4a-43: khams dang skye mched dag dang ni //
T03D3786:4a-44: khams gsum po la gnas dang chags //
T03D3786:4a-45: sems ni kun tu zhum pa dang //
T03D3786:4a-46: dkon mchog gsum dang tshul khrims la //
T03D3786:4a-47: der lta ba yi mngon zhen dang //
T03D3786:4a-48: stong pa nyid la rtsod pa dang //
T03D3786:4a-49: de dang 'gal ba'i nyes pa ni //
T03D3786:4a-50: nyi shu gang la rnam chad pa //
T03D3786:4a-51: de yis sa ni bdun pa 'thob //
T03D3786:4b-0: rnam thar sgo @4b gsum shes pa dang //
T03D3786:4b-1: 'khor gsum rnam par dag nyid dang //
T03D3786:4b-2: snying rje dang ni rlom med dang //
T03D3786:4b-3: chos mnyam nyid dang tshul gcig shes //
T03D3786:4b-4: mi skye ba dang bzod shes dang //
T03D3786:4b-5: chos rnams pa gcig tu ston //
T03D3786:4b-6: rtog pa kun tu 'joms pa dang //
T03D3786:4b-7: 'du shes lta dang nyon mongs spong ;
T03D3786:4b-8: / zhi gnas nges par sems pa dang //
T03D3786:4b-9: lhag mthong la ni mkhas pa dang //
T03D3786:4b-10: sems dul ba dang thams cad la //
T03D3786:4b-11: thogs pa med pa'i ye shes dang //
T03D3786:4b-12: chags pa'i sa min gar 'dod par //
T03D3786:4b-13: zhing gzhan du ni mnyam 'gro dang //
T03D3786:4b-14: kun tu bdag gi ngo bo ni //
T03D3786:4b-15: ston pa nyid dang nyi shu'o //
T03D3786:4b-16: sems can kun yid shes pa dang //
T03D3786:4b-17: mngon par shes pas brtse ba dang //
T03D3786:4b-18: sangs rgyas zhing bzang sgrub pa dang //
T03D3786:4b-19: yongs su brtag phyir sangs rgyas brten //
T03D3786:4b-20: dbang po shes dang rgyal ba yi //
T03D3786:4b-21: zhing sbyong sgyu ma ltar gnas dang //
T03D3786:4b-22: bsams bzhin srid pa len pa dang //
T03D3786:4b-23: las ni rnam pa 'di brgyad bshad //
T03D3786:4b-24: smon lam dag ni mtha' yas dang //
T03D3786:4b-25: lha la sogs pa'i skad shes dang //
T03D3786:4b-26: spobs pa chu bo lta bu dang //
T03D3786:4b-27: mngal du 'jug pa mchog dang ni //
T03D3786:4b-28: rigs dang rus dang cho 'brang dang //
T03D3786:4b-29: 'khor dang skye ba dag dang ni //
T03D3786:4b-30: nges 'byung byang chub shing rnams dang //
T03D3786:4b-31: yon tan bun sum tshogs pa yin //
T03D3786:4b-32: sa dgu 'das nas ye shes ni //
T03D3786:4b-33: gang gis sangs rgyas sar gnas pa //
T03D3786:4b-34: de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa //
T03D3786:4b-35: bcu pa yin par shes par bya //
T03D3786:4b-36: mthong dang sgom pa'i lam dag la //
T03D3786:4b-37: gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog rnams //
T03D3786:4b-38: nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir //
T03D3786:4b-39: gnyer po rnam pa brgyad ces bya //
T03D3786:4b-40: ched du bya dang mnyam nyid dang //
T03D3786:4b-41: sems can don dang 'bad med dang //
T03D3786:4b-43: thob pa'i mtshan nyid nges 'byung dang //
T03D3786:4b-44: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid dang //
T03D3786:4b-45: lam gyi yul can nges 'byung ste //
T03D3786:4b-46: rnam pa brgyad kyi bdag nyid 'di //
T03D3786:4b-47: nges 'byung sgrub pa yin zhes bya //
T03D3786:4b-48: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag
T03D3786:4b-49: gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi tshig
T03D3786:5a-3: // / lha rnams rung bar bya ba'i phyir //
T03D3786:5a-4: 'od kyis mgo mog par mdzad dang //
T03D3786:5a-5: yul nges pa dang khyab pa dang //
T03D3786:5a-6: rang bzhin dang ni de yi las //
T03D3786:5a-7: lam shes nyid kyi tshul la ni //
T03D3786:5a-8: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dag gi //
T03D3786:5a-9: rnam pa mi dmigs sgo nas ni //
T03D3786:5a-10: nyan thos lam 'di shes par bya //
T03D3786:5a-11: 'phags pa nyan thos lam la ni //
T03D3786:5a-12: gzugs la sogs pa stong pa'i phyir //
T03D3786:5a-13: stong pa nyid rnams dbyer med pas //
T03D3786:5a-14: dro ba de dag mi dmigs pas //
T03D3786:5a-15: rtse mor gyur pa dag tu 'dod //

T03D3786:11b-34: sangs rgyas rnams ni byung gyur kyang //

T03D3786:12a-2: phyag ni zhabs bcas 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags //

T03D3786:12a-28: sgrub byed rgyu yi mtshan nyid de ;
